title: पाकिस्तान में बच्ची से छेड़खानी के आरोपी की दाढ़ी और भौहें निकाली गयीं, वीडियो इंडिया का बताकर वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Let police file a case against this monster under POCSO Act. Public should not change his look. Otherwise there will be a problem with the victim to identify him. Punishment under POCSO is very severe. Let law handle him instead of providing him with an escape route like this.
